original_text: So the bad spirit goes out and it brings back seven other spirits. They are even worse than itself. They all go into the person and they live there. Now the person's life is even worse than it was before. The same thing will happen to you bad people who are alive today.’
korean_text: 이에 가서 저보다 더 악한 귀신 일곱을 데리고 들어가서 거하니 그 사람의 나중 형편이 전보다 더욱 심하게 되느니라 이 악한 세대가 또한 이렇게 되리라

sentences.original_text: So the bad spirit goes out
and it brings back seven other spirits.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일곱 개의 다른 영들을 데리고 옵니다.

sentences.original_text: They are even worse than itself.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 자신보다 훨씬 더 악합니다.

sentences.original_text: They all go into the person
Now the person's life is even worse than it was before.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그 사람의 삶은 이전보다 훨씬 더 나빠집니다.

sentences.original_text: The same thing will happen to you bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 일이 너희 악한 사람들에게 일어날 것입니다
